segments.text: ( At the MET station ) Hurry up ! We are running late for school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's take the MET . lt's faster and cheap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which line should we take if we go to Danshui ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We should take the red line . Let's get the tickets at the automatic vending Machine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much money should I insert in the slot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 5o dollars . Later you have to place your ticket near the sensor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's so crowded . All the seats are taken . Let's go there . There is a seat over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a priority seat . We can not sit there . We should give the seats to those eld , pregnant and disabled people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , you are right . Let's stand . It takes only about 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If we go to Danshui in the morning on A weekday , we are sure to have seats since it's not during rush hour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyway , we are arriving at Danshui soon . I can't wait to watch the beautiful sunset .
segments.speaker: S2
